title: WordGirl Episodes 1x11 to 1x13 (XviD-MP3 640x480)

------
1x11
------
"Shrinkin' in the Ray"
WordGirl must defeat Dr 2-Brains when he invents a shrink ray,
and uses it to shrink down the cheesy items he covets for easy stealing.
Vocab words: Increase, Decrease

"Department Store Tobey"
Tobey interrupts the Botsford's shoe shopping trip, as he tries
to impress WordGirl with his elaborate riddles - but he's too
clever for his own good.
Vocab words: Malfunction, Clever

------
1x12
------
"Chuck E Sneeze"
WordGirl has to battle Chuck's latest evil scheme, while also
fighting off a nasty cold.
Vocab words: Avoid, Contagious

"Swap Meat"
The Butcher is making a bundle, auctioning off forgeries of
famous lost works of art.. WordGirl has to figure out how
he's pulling it off.
Vocab words: Forgery, Magnificent

------
1x13
------
"Granny's All-Cure Good Time Spritzer"
WordGirl must put a stop to GrannyMay's latest con game -
selling phony bottles of 'all-cure' spritzer that restores youth.
Vocab words: Hoax, Potent
